general_insights: Users appreciate clear, step-by-step guidance when dealing with unfamiliar technology.
Offering practical tips and preparation strategies can significantly enhance user satisfaction.
Understanding the user's context and tailoring responses to their specific needs can lead to higher satisfaction.
